column2: No Major Status Effects are in place for this province
This province was struck by nuclear weapons that caused significant radioactive contamination. It will take a long time for radition levels to return to normal.
This province was struck by bioweapons that caused a significant epidemic. Only a vaccine will remove this modifier.
This province was struck by chemical weapons that caused significant contamination. Only time can clean this province.
This province was recently destroyed by a devastating war. Recovery will take time.
This province was struck by a natural disaster.
This province was contaminated following a nuclear reactor meltdown. It will take a long time for radition levels to return to normal.
